annotations.annotation: Section 3 of D.C. Law 12-104, as amended by § 59(a) of D.C. Law 12-264, repealed §§ 1-1188.7 through 1-1188.12 [§§ 2-308.07 through 2-308.12, 2001 Ed.].
For temporary repeal of §§ 1-1188.8 through 1-1188.12, see § 3 of the Procurement Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-374, April 24, 1998, 45 DCR 4338).

For temporary addition of §§ 1-1188.13 and 1-1188.14 1981 Ed., see § 2 of the Procurement Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-62, April 15, 1997, 44 DCR 2413), and see § 2 of the Procurement Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-133, August 12, 1997, 44 DCR 4832).

For temporary amendment of subpart, see § 2 of the Procurement Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-62, April 15, 1997, 44 DCR 2413), and see § 2 of the Procurement Reform Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-133, August 12, 1997, 44 DCR 4832).
For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 2 of the Procurement Reform Temporary Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Law 12-17, September 12, 1997, law notification 44 DCR 5459)
